cause.description:
We are on a quest to find the much sought after and fabled "Eternal Burrito." Any who are strong of stomach, rad of being, and rogue of heart may lend their skills to this troupe of rogue burrito eaters.
1. The Eternal Burrito will give you endless life
2. Burrito eating is a universal right
3. The widespread proliferation of burrito eating
cause.name: Rogue Burrito Hunters
